attributes.action: reject any efforts made to rename the historic city of Londonderry as "Derry" through the Privy Council as to do so would be divisive and against the interests of the citizens, past and present, of that city.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The city of Londonderry was established by the 12 Great Companies of the City of London, acting through The Honourable the Irish Society.  Today, citizens call the city both Londonderry and Derry - no-one is forced to use either name if they do not wish to.  This status quo should be preserved.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
